citations.narrative:
There were no samples taken to monitor for internal parasites for the adult dogs in the last 12 months. The written
program of veterinary care states that composite fecal samples on adult dogs will be conducted at least annually. Failure
to conduct annual sampling can effect the preventative program for internal parasites established for the adult dogs.
Licensee must follow the written program of veterinary care on file for sampling for internal parasites. Correct by
November 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were no samples taken to monitor for internal parasites for the adult dogs in the last 12 months. The written 
program of veterinary care states that composite fecal samples on adult dogs will be conducted at least annually. Failure 
to conduct annual sampling can effect the preventative program for internal parasites established for the adult dogs. 
Licensee must follow the written program of veterinary care on file for sampling for internal parasites. Correct by 
November 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
